resources.string: Trying to log in failed with the following error: %1$s
Refreshing account failed with the following error: %1$s\n\nYou can continue, but your lists and filters may be incomplete.
Tap the account to try again.
Tap the same account to try again, or a different account to login with that account.
%1$s\n\nTap \"%2$s\" to try again, or \"%3$s\" to choose a different account.

Fetching some account details failed:

%1$s

Tap "%2$s" to continue, but some information may be incorrect (e.g., filters and lists).

Tap "%3$s" to try again.

Tap "%4$s" to choose another account.
Pachli was opened to share content with type \"%1$s\", but Pachli does not handle that type.
